text: Kerstin Kristina Birgitta "Kim" Anderzon (20 March 1943 â€“ 24 October 2014), was a Swedish actress. She starred on movies and theatre. Her daughter Anna Catharina Tintin Anderzon is also an actress. She won the award for Best Actress at the 19th Guldbagge Awards for her role in Second Dance. Along with Tomas Bolme, she co-hosted the 27th Guldbagge Awards. Anderzon died of spinal cancer in Stockholm, Sweden, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Deaths from spinal cancer Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish stage actors
title: Kim Anderzon
